amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit federal interference with the interstate traffic of unpasteurized milk and milk products between States that allow the distribution of unpasteurized milk or milk products for direct human consumption.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 25 printed in House Report 115-679 to prohibit federal interference with the interstate traffic of unpasteurized milk and milk products between States that allow the distribution of unpasteurized milk or milk products for direct human consumption.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 79 - 331 (Roll no. 201).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A042) offered by Mr. Massie.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 79 - 331 (Roll no. 201).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
